meanings.definition: The quality of being respectable or worthy of respect.
meanings.sent1: Her respectableness shone through in the way she treated everyone with kindness.
meanings.sent2: The community admired his respectableness and integrity.
meanings.sent3: Despite his silly hat, his respectableness was unquestionable.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of chaos, her respectableness was a beacon of light.
meanings.sent5: The respectableness of the elderly gentleman left a lasting impression on the young ones.

meanings.definition: The state of being regarded with honor or esteem.
meanings.sent1: The respectableness of the award-winning scientist was well-deserved.
meanings.sent2: In that prestigious school, academic excellence was a key factor in determining respectableness.
meanings.sent3: The respectableness of the clown at the party was unexpected but delightful.
meanings.sent4: His respectableness in the eyes of his peers was akin to that of a king.
meanings.sent5: The respectableness of the historical figure was celebrated for generations to come.
